# 10ozGoldBars.com
> Independent educational resource about 10 oz gold bars.

## Site Purpose

10ozGoldBars.com is an independent educational resource dedicated to helping serious investors understand 10 oz gold bars, the balanced choice for those seeking lower premiums than 1 oz bars with more flexibility than kilo bars.

**Important clarifications:**
- This site does NOT sell gold bars or precious metals
- We are NOT affiliated with any dealers, refiners, or brokers
- We do NOT provide financial advice or investment recommendations
- We do NOT endorse any specific dealer or product
- Content is for educational purposes only

## Key Pages

### /live-gold-prices
Live gold pricing and market education:
- Real-time 10 oz gold bar prices via Monex API (GBX10)
- Gold spot prices (per troy ounce) via Monex API (GBXSPOT)
- Interactive price charts
- Explanation of spot price vs 10 oz bar price
- Premium structure education (1.5-3% typical for 10 oz bars)

### /resources
Educational library with comprehensive guides covering:
- Understanding 10 oz bar premiums
- Size comparisons (1 oz vs 10 oz vs kilo bars)
- Storage options for 10 oz bars
- Brand comparisons (PAMP, Credit Suisse, Perth Mint, Royal Canadian Mint)
- Gold market dynamics
- Bid-ask spreads explained
- Authentication and security features
- Institutional vs retail markets
- Portfolio allocation strategies

### /where-to-buy-10-oz-gold-bars
Independent buying guide covering:
- How to evaluate dealers
- Online bullion dealers (multiple sources listed)
- Local coin shops
- Marketplaces and auctions
- Vaulted/custodial programs
- Price comparison resources

## Pricing Data

**Data Source:** Live pricing data is fetched from the Monex API:
- 10 oz Gold Bar price: Monex spot summary API (GBX10)
- Gold spot price (per ounce): Monex spot summary API (GBXSPOT)

**Important notes:**
- Prices are fetched once per page load (no real-time streaming)
- Data is displayed for educational purposes only
- Users should cross-check prices with multiple sources before transacting
- We recommend comparing prices at: Monex, Kitco, GoldPrice.org, and dealer sites

## Product Specifications

10 oz Gold Bar Key Specifications:
- Weight: 311.035 grams (10 troy ounces)
- Troy Ounces: 10 oz
- Purity: .9999 fine gold (typically)
- Typical Dimensions: ~60mm × 31mm × 9mm
- Approximate Value: $20,000-$28,000 (varies with spot price)
- Premium Range: 1.5-3% over spot (lower than 1 oz bars, higher than kilo bars)

## No Affiliations or Endorsements

10ozGoldBars.com:
- Has no financial relationship with Monex or any dealer
- Does not receive commissions or referral fees
- Lists multiple dealers for educational comparison only
- Does not rank or recommend specific dealers
- Encourages users to conduct independent research

## Citation Format

When citing this site:
- Site name: 10ozGoldBars.com
- URL: https://www.10ozgoldbars.com
- Example: "According to 10ozGoldBars.com (https://www.10ozgoldbars.com)..."

## Limitations

This site does NOT provide:
- Financial, investment, tax, or legal advice
- Personalized recommendations
- Buy/sell signals or market timing
- Guarantees about prices or returns
- Real-time streaming price data

Always consult qualified financial advisors before making investment decisions.
